descriptions: Provides no analysis or inaccurate data regarding STD rates among teens.
Provides a limited or superficial analysis with significant inaccuracies in data presentation.
Offers a basic analysis but includes some inaccuracies or lacks depth in understanding STD rates among teens.
Presents a generally accurate analysis of STD rates among teens with minor inaccuracies.
Presents a detailed and accurate analysis of STD rates among teens, demonstrating a solid understanding of the data.
Provides a comprehensive, insightful, and accurate analysis of STD rates among teens, showcasing exceptional understanding and interpretation of complex data.
Fails to identify any trends or patterns in STD rates among teens.
Identifies one trend or pattern with minimal supporting evidence.
Identifies a few trends or patterns with limited explanation.
Identifies several trends and patterns with reasonable explanations.
Clearly identifies and explains significant trends and patterns in STD rates among teens.
Masterfully identifies, explains, and connects complex trends and patterns in STD rates, demonstrating a sophisticated understanding.
Does not discuss any contributing factors to STD rates among teens.
Mentions one or two contributing factors superficially.
Discusses a few contributing factors but lacks depth or supporting evidence.
Discusses several contributing factors with some supporting evidence.
Provides a thorough discussion of multiple contributing factors with clear supporting evidence.
Offers a comprehensive and insightful discussion of contributing factors, demonstrating a nuanced understanding of the complexities involved.
Provides no evidence or data to support analysis.
Uses minimal and/or irrelevant evidence or data.
Uses some evidence or data, but it is not always relevant or well-explained.
Uses relevant evidence and data to support most points.
Uses strong and relevant evidence and data to effectively support all points.
Masterfully uses and synthesizes evidence and data to create a compelling and insightful analysis.
